io.micronaut.http.uri

Interface UriTemplate.PathSegment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.CharSequence
    Enclosing class:
    UriTemplate

    protected static interface UriTemplate.PathSegment
extends java.lang.CharSequence
    Represents an expandable path segment.
